Dougal ordered to investigate the location marked on the shifting map, and to take Zolyn along.

Meanwhile, Zolyn was trying hard to figure out where Paesyn was.
rescued Paesyn from monsters and brought him to Zolyn.

Paesyn had picking flowers to make bouquet for Zolyn. Receiving the bouquet, Zolyn is reminded of her missing sister, and forgave Paesyn's earlier, clumsier efforts to cheer her.

Are you going to investigate right now?

You should take Zolyn with you. She's eager to find any clues as to where her sister might be—and if you run into trouble, you'll need her."Good idea. Where can I find her?"

She went looking for Paesyn. He's out picking flowers or something.

Take a look around the area—you're bound to run into her."Okay, thanks."

I'm looking for Pae— that hairball popori. I can't find him anywhere.

Dougal said he was with you earlier, by the sheep meadow?"I haven't."

Of course; he's the engineer of our ship...and a member of our expedition.

And contrary to what you might think, I actually like him. I just wish he didn't try so hard to make people show that they like him.

What are you looking at? Are you going to help me or not?"It's Paesyn. Of course I'll help."

You left him somewhere out here...alone?

I understand that you're the self-sufficient type, and a hero of the Argon War and all that, but not everyone is as capable as you are!

Now, are you going to help me look for him or not?"He's more capable than you think. But yes, I'll help."
(Paesyn clearly came this way...but it's odd that he would drop something like this from his toolbox and not notice.)<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Looks like he went this way."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
(It's almost as though Paesyn were dropping the heaviest things he was carrying...)<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"He was running from something..."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
I got lost! I must've taken a wrong turn or something, because the next thing I knew, I was surrounded by those...things!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What were you doing out here?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Ah, well...when you didn't come back right away with the springlike flowers, I thought maybe you had forgotten. So I decided to look for them myself—and I found them! I...I guess I wasn't paying too much attention to my surroundings...

Anyway, I've put together a bouquet of flowers for Zolyn.

Oh! Here she comes! Umm, could I ask you to deliver them for me, ?"This is the last time, right? Then okay."

What's that you've got? Oh, gods! Not another present from that useless hair...ball...

Springlike flowers? My sister and I used to pick these together...

How did you...? Oh, they're from Paesyn, aren't they? Oh, brother...

Brother, I am so sorry for how I've acted! Can you ever forgive me?"I think you just made his day, Zolyn."

! Did you see that?

Zolyn is finally warming up to me! She actually smiled at me! I mean, a real smile—not that "I-can't-wait-to-kill-you" smile she gives her enemies!

I knew she just needed the right gesture to help her cheer up!"She does seem a lot less murder-y. Well done, Paesyn."
...Okay, that's enough celebrating. Back to work!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"...and right back to murder-y."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Dougal sent me to help you find some secret laboratory?

Let me get Paesyn somewhere safe, and gather some soldiers, and I'll meet up with you shortly."Sounds good. Take care, Paesyn!"
